lines.text: You want to know something interesting?
You know this place we're staying? Used to be part of an old Indian burial ground. It's very sacred and holy.
Ooo scary! What is it cursed or something?
Yeah. As a matter of fact, it is.

[possessed by evil]
You have violated the ancient ways, and so must die.
You're only cursed by the evil spirits if you violate the graves of the dead. We're just gonna be eating hotdogs.
